title: Plans, etc.
context: §322-27 Plans, etc. The comptroller shall transmit to the board with each appeal the appropriate map or plan (or a copy thereof) of the lands to be improved prepared in accordance with the requirements of section 322-22, and shall also transmit to the board with each appeal a statement of the matters and things required by section 322-22 to be noted upon or to accompany the map. [L 1911, c 112, §6; am L 1915, c 190, §5; RL 1925, §981; RL 1935, §1331; RL 1945, §2722; RL 1955, §47-26; am L Sp 1959 2d, c 1, §12; HRS §322-27]
